title: Detective Conan OVA 05: The Target is Kogoro! The Detective Boys' Secret Investigation
synopsis: Conan Edogawa and his classmates are assigned to do a class report about a small business of their choice. After discarding other possible topics, the Detective Boys concludes that it's a perfect opportunity to find out more about  Detective Kogorou Mouri's job.
characters: ['Edogawa, Conan', 'Haibara, Ai', 'Mouri, Kogorou', 'Yoshida, Ayumi', 'Tsuburaya, Mitsuhiko', 'Kojima, Genta', 'Mouri, Ran', 'Agasa, Hiroshi', 'Kobayashi, Sumiko', 'Murakami, Masaya']
